data.title: Evelyn Hewat (Beauly) – William T Fraser & Son
data.text:
19.08.1943 – 04.04.2024

Very peacefully, at the Highland Hospice on Thursday 4th April 2024, Evelyn Hewat of Beauly, aged 80 years. Former midwife in London. Twin and dear sister of the late Alan, loving aunt of Maria and Melanie, great aunt to their children and a good friend of many. Funeral service on Wednesday 10th April at 2.30pm in the Funeral Home of William T Fraser and Son, Culduthel Road, Inverness. All friends respectfully invited. Dress code optional. No flowers at Evelyn’s request. Donations, if desired, for Barnardo’s may be given at the service or forwarded to the Funeral Directors.
